trait.name: Iron Scent
entries: Cragbeard can pinpoint, by scent, the location of ferrous metal within 300 feet of it.

action.name: Fist of Iron
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) magical bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Rise
entries: Three times per day, when Cragbeard is about to get hit, he can instead rise himself higher on a pillar made of stone. Doing this, he raises his AC by 5 for the duration of the attacker's turn. The pillar shrinks back into the earth when the attacker's turn is over.

monster.name: Despa
actionHeader: Despa has multiattack. They can make three kick attacks on a turn, or two wind attacks.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Wind Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2}) magical slashing damage.

action.name: Charge
entries: Despa charges at least 30 feet towards and opponent, annihilating them with pure force and speed.
{@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}37 ({@damage 10d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

bonus.name: Charge
entries: Despa charges 30 feet towards a combatant, then does a melee attack.

bonus.name: Overwhelming Speed
entries: Despa's body is overcome by speed blurs and motion lines, causing any ranged attacks against him to be made with disadvantage until his next turn.

bonus.name: Feint
entries: Despa moves in front of and behind an opponent quickly, causing them to have to choose which direction the next attack will come from. This causes Despa's next attack to have advantage against them.

reaction.name: Evasion
entries: If Despa is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails. It can't use this trait if it's {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: If an opponent attempts to attack Despa with an attack of opportunity, Despa makes an attack against them instead.

legendaryHeader: Despa can do one legendary action per round.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Despa makes an attack towards a creature in his range.

legendary.name: Dodge
entries: Despa causes an attack against him to have disadvantage.

legendary.name: Legendary Resistance
entries: If Despa fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed it instead.

monster.name: Greed
actionHeader: Greed has a multiattack. He can make three attacks with his scimitar, or one scimitar attack and cast one spell.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) damage.

action.name: Midas Touch
entries: Greed makes a melee spell attack. The target has to make a {@dc 15} constitution save, or else they turn to gold. This is reversable only through a Remove Curse or Dispel Magic of 3rd level or higher.

monster.name: Maya Redbeard

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, Maya Redbeard can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, Maya Redbeard can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

actionHeader: Multiattack. Maya makes two melee attacks, then uses Leadership.

action.name: Quarterstaff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit +7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Leadership
entries: For 1 minute, Maya Redbeard can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand Maya Redbeard. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if Maya Redbeard is {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: Maya Redbeard adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, Maya Redbeard must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.
